metadata.name: Neko Koi Fanstasy
metadata.description:
This is 1/1 special unique NFT from Anime x Art collection.

Koi is a Japanese fish that is not only a symbol of good luck, but also of success, victory and courage in battle.

In Japanese culture, Koi carps symbolise love, as the word love and the name of these carps sound the same.

Koi fish were also often used as jewellery for samurai and traditional Japanese clothing such as kimonos and yukatas.

Size of NFT: 2832 x 4083 px.
14 MB

Size of Physical Painting: 50 x 70 cm.

Can be purchased as single NFT or NFT + physical art.
